description: meta info used by the EP parser, all names are expected to start with lammps_

metaInfos.description: PBC image flag index.
metaInfos.name: atom_positions_image_index

metaInfos.description: Position of the atoms in a scaled format [0, 1].
metaInfos.name: atom_positions_scaled

metaInfos.description: Position of the atoms wrapped back to the periodic box.
metaInfos.name: atom_positions_wrapped

metaInfos.description: MD barostat target pressure.
metaInfos.name: barostat_target_pressure

metaInfos.description: MD barostat relaxation time.
metaInfos.name: barostat_tau

metaInfos.description: MD barostat type, valid values are defined in the barostat_type wiki page.
metaInfos.name: barostat_type

metaInfos.description: MD integration time step.
metaInfos.name: integrator_dt

metaInfos.description: MD integrator type, valid values are defined in the integrator_type wiki page.
metaInfos.name: integrator_type

metaInfos.description: Reference to the atom type of each interaction atoms.
metaInfos.name: interaction_atom_to_atom_type_ref

metaInfos.description: Langevin thermostat damping factor.
metaInfos.name: langevin_gamma

metaInfos.description: Reference to the atom type of each molecule interaction atoms.
metaInfos.name: molecule_interaction_atom_to_atom_type_ref

metaInfos.description: Number of defined pair interactions within a molecule (L-J pairs).
metaInfos.name: number_of_defined_molecule_pair_interactions

metaInfos.description: Number of defined pair interactions (L-J pairs).
metaInfos.name: number_of_defined_pair_interactions

metaInfos.description: Number of requested MD integration time steps.
metaInfos.name: number_of_steps_requested

metaInfos.description: Reference to the atom type for pair interactions.
metaInfos.name: pair_interaction_atom_type_ref

metaInfos.description: Pair interactions parameters.
metaInfos.name: pair_interaction_parameters

metaInfos.description: Molecule pair interactions parameters.
metaInfos.name: pair_molecule_interaction_parameters

metaInfos.description: Reference to the atom type for pair interactions within a molecule.
metaInfos.name: pair_molecule_interaction_to_atom_type_ref

metaInfos.description: MD thermostat level (see wiki: single, multiple, regional).
metaInfos.name: thermostat_level

metaInfos.description: MD thermostat target temperature.
metaInfos.name: thermostat_target_temperature

metaInfos.description: MD thermostat relaxation time.
metaInfos.name: thermostat_tau

metaInfos.description: MD thermostat type, valid values are defined in the thermostat_type wiki page.
metaInfos.name: thermostat_type

metaInfos.description: Program version date.
metaInfos.name: x_lammps_program_version_date
